recap_documents.description: TRANSCRIPT OF PRETRIAL HEARING in case as to CHRISTOPHER WARNAGIRIS before Judge Paul L. Friedman held on March 25, 2024; Page Numbers: 1-116. Date of Issuance: 3/28/2024. Court Reporter: Bryan A. Wayne. Transcripts may be ordered by submitting the Transcript Order FormFor the first 90 days after this filing date, the transcript may be viewed at the courthouse at a public terminal or purchased from the court reporter referenced above. After 90 days, the transcript may be accessed via PACER. Other transcript formats, (multi-page, condensed, CD or ASCII) may be purchased from the court reporter.NOTICE RE REDACTION OF TRANSCRIPTS: The parties have twenty-one days to file with the court and the court reporter any request to redact personal identifiers from this transcript. If no such requests are filed, the transcript will be made available to the public via PACER without redaction after 90 days. The policy, which includes the five personal identifiers specifically covered, is located on our website at www.dcd.uscourts.gov. Redaction Request due 4/18/2024. Redacted Transcript Deadline set for 4/28/2024. Release of Transcript Restriction set for 6/26/2024.(Wayne, Bryan) (Entered: 03/28/2024)
